author: Steve
text: I’m so confused. So did this Dream problem happen over twitter or something? Also I can’t believe everything that’s happened. I mean no offense but they just can’t leave one streamer alone, can they?

author: Steve
text: YALL SO MUCH IS GOING ON. I CANNOT KEEP UP WITH THIS STUFF. FIRST LIKE THE DREAMTEAM STUFF AND NOW THE LORE???

author: Steve
text: THE LORE STREAM FROM GEORGE WAS ABSOLUTELY AMAZING! MY EMOTIONS WERE ALL OVER THE PLACE AND I WAS SO AMAZED BY THE ENDING!
